name: Ricky Iwasaki
title: Ingeneri ya software
summary: Inararibonye ya software ikora, ishakisha amahirwe mashya yo gukora imishinga minini. Ushishikajwe no gukora cyangwa kongera kode kubandi bakoresha. Nizera ko ubuhanga bwanjye ari buto ugereranije na enterineti, bityo rero nshishikajwe cyane no gukorana nibindi bikoresho, serivisi, indimi za porogaramu.

experience.title: Ingeneri ya software
responsibilities: Yubatswe kandi ishyirwa mubikorwa porogaramu nini y'urubuga ukoresheje React na Node.js
Yafatanije n'abashinzwe ibicuruzwa kunonosora ibisabwa no kwemeza gutanga ku gihe
Yateje imbere kandi ikomeza RESTful APIs kumurongo wurubuga
Yateje imbere inyandiko zo gutangiza imirimo no kunoza imikorere

experience.title: Umutoza wungirije wa Tennis
responsibilities: Kwigisha tekinike ya tennis mumatsinda igizwe nabakinnyi 5-10
Gukora isomo bishimishije no kwinezeza kubakinnyi
Ashinzwe umutekano wabakinnyi mukibuga, cyane cyane abakinnyi bato nabakuze, nkabana 3 nimyaka 60;

experience.title: Kwinjira hanze
responsibilities: Gutwara ibicuruzwa ku makamyo yo kugemura
Kugumana umutekano kandi wuje urugwiro kubakiriya n'abakozi

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Urubuga rusubiza rwerekana imishinga nubuhanga ukoresheje tekinoroji igezweho
